Upon killing an entity there is a chance that your hunger will be replenished
enchantment.fabricenchantments.ice_aspec: Slows the target down on each hit
enchantment.fabricenchantments.poison_as: Poisons the target on each hit
enchantment.fabricenchantments.rise.desc: Upon being hit, the target floats up in the air for a short duration
enchantment.fabricenchantments.nocturnal: When the user is hit in the night they become invisible for a short duration
enchantment.fabricenchantments.tank.desc: Grants the user protection from unblockable and armor bypassing damage
enchantment.fabricenchantments.ender_min: When the user is hit and is below 4 hearts, they get teleported away a short distance
enchantment.fabricenchantments.sugar_rus: Upon killing an entity the wearer becomes fast and has increased jump height
enchantment.fabricenchantments.experienc: Grants the user more experience when killing entities
enchantment.fabricenchantments.double_sw: Has a 5% chance for the user's Axe to swing twice
enchantment.fabricenchantments.sniper.de: The user does more damage the further they are from their target
enchantment.fabricenchantments.beheading: Has a 5% chance for Creepers, Zombies, and Skeletons to drop their head when killed
enchantment.fabricenchantments.paralysis: Upon hitting a target the target will be frozen and have extremely low attack speed. Lasts for 2 seconds
enchantment.fabricenchantments.god_of_th: Has a 5% chance for lightning to summon upon the target
enchantment.fabricenchantments.auto_smel: Allows the player to recieve smelted versions of any block they break. Works with every block that can be smelted
enchantment.fabricenchantments.pumpkin_h: The user can stare at enderman directly without enderman attacking them
enchantment.fabricenchantments.god_of_th: Grants water breathing while the user is holding the enchanted item
enchantment.fabricenchantments.shotgun.d: Deal more damage the closer you are to your target
enchantment.fabricenchantments.glimmerin: Stops piglins from attacking the user like gold armor
enchantment.fabricenchantments.charged_b: A crossbow enchantment that has a 30% to strike the target with lightning
enchantment.fabricenchantments.replenish: Instantly consumes seeds and replants crops when broken
enchantment.fabricenchantments.pyromania: Deals extra damage to entities that are on fire
enchantment.fabricenchantments.pulse.des: Fires a sonic boom that targets the nearest enemy
